snippet.title: Fun Run 3 Trailer
snippet.description:
Download for Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dirtybit.fra
Download for iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/fun-run-arena-multiplayer/id1118878857?l=nb&ls=1&mt=8


Fun Run is back

More than 80 million players all over the world loved the first two Fun Run games! Get ready for even more action packed craziness as Fun Run is back in its 3rd and most awesome version to date! Come join the madness! 

Enter the Arena

Fun Run 3: Arena features a new game mode with the most intense Fun Run gameplay ever! The Arena hosts elimination games for 8 players where you compete for amazing rewards and ultimate glory. Run as fast as you can and use your powerups wisely, for only the best 3 players will reach the finish line!


The Coolest Running Game Around

Play this lively online running game and prove that you are the fastest runner. Racing other players is incredibly satisfying when you escape obstacles and sabotage your fellow runners’ progress to WIN the race. Deploy the iconic sawblades, dodge devious traps and powerful thunderstorms to get to the finish line first. No holding back!

Are you the fastest?

Bring your game face, your closest friends or enemies and your cutest, furriest animals. Prove that you are the strongest, the fastest, and make sure to rub it in when you win! With simple, fun and addictive gameplay, Fun Run Arena is the only game you really need. Your friends are already at the starting line – where are you?!

Show off your style and be the coolest critter in the forest

Customize your avatar with more options than ever! Choose between different cute animals and dress up with cool hats, boots, sunglasses and even more swag to show off your style!


Cool & Fun Features
★ Race against friends or random players in real-time online!
★ 30+ new powerups! Unlock more as you play!
★ Select your favorite 8 powerups and perfect your play style!
★ Run for your life and for ultimate glory in the Arena, the new 8 player race mode!
★ Introducing Slam & Slide: Two new actions to leave the opposition in the dust!
★ All new swag: Customize your avatar with more options than ever!
★ Get amazing rewards and prizes from quests and achievements!
★ Form a Clan and dominate the trails with your best friends!
★ Conquer lots of new levels with their own twists and turns!
★ Clan Battles in a 2v2 mode for fame and glory! 
★ Climb the leaderboards and challenge the best players in the world!
★ 100% real multiplayer!


Fun Run 3: Arena is a free online multiplayer game – an internet connection is required.


The Arena awaits! Download Fun Run 3 today and challenge your friends & family! Start running! Ready, Set, GO!
